EmailTemplate.subject: Thankyou email - basic
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Template Base
We appreciate you contacting us.
I'm a block of text and I like latin. Pellentesque vel dui sed orci faucibus iaculis. Suspendisse dictum magna id purus tincidunt rutrum.
The personal information collected by us, or on our behalf, will be used to respond to your inquiry, to inform you about university related events and courses in accordance with the Monash University Privacy Collection Statement ( http://privacy.monash.edu.au/guidelines/collection-personal-information.html) . You have the right to access personal information that Monash University holds about you, subject to any exemptions in relevant legislation. Further information about how your personal information is handled at Monash University is available at http://privacy.monash.edu. If you wish to seek access to your personal information, please contact the University Privacy Officer by email at privacyofficer@monash.edu
